text: The Nasarawa State House of Assembly is the unicameral legislature of Nasarawa State in Nigeria. The House of Assembly consists of 24 members, including a Speaker and Deputy Speaker. The legislature is seated in Lafia, the capital city of Nasarawa State. ==References== ==External links== *Nasarawa State of Nigeria: The Legislature: Members of the Nasarawa State House of Assembly Category:State legislatures of Nigeria Category:Government of Nasarawa State Category:Lafia Category:Unicameral legislatures
title: Nasarawa State House of Assembly
